name: Crazy Story: Match 3 Games & Free Matching Puzzle

description:
Crazy Story: New Match 3 Games & Free Matching Puzzle, from the makers of Spots Connect, Birds Pop Mania, Candy World, and Witch Connect!

Sophia is here to take her with you into her dream world filled with colorful cookies, candies, cakes, ice cream, ice lollies, and jellies!
Launchship Studios has come up with innovative gameplay that promises to be sweet and thrilling at the same time. It has some of the best audio-visual effects to take your gaming experience to the next level! Enjoy the mystical journey like never before in this unique 3 modes gameplay.

Want to experience the new swap cake match-three game that is unique and full of fun? Looking for innovative jelly crazy games on your smart devices? If yes, Sophia’s Crazy games Match three is here for you. She loves fantasies. She longs for sweets and collecting them makes her cheerful. In her dreams, these items are trapped in boxes and you can help stock them for her. Play by blasting, matching 3 or connecting the sweetmeats now! It is a Free Match-3 game for everyone.

Crazy Story With Sophia’s Gummy Matching Swap Adventure, you will fall in love with sugar candy match adventure once again. This delightful game has multiple levels and obstacles. Complete the levels and enjoy this Puzzle Adventure Matching three.

★ Game Features ★
✔️ Hundreds of Exciting levels.
✔️ Collect sweet candies, Cakes and enjoy the Free Swap, Blast and Connect game.
✔️ A dream-like experience that is exciting.
✔️ Highly addictive with new challenges at every level. 
✔️ Connect with friends and family and challenge their scores on social media.
✔️ Download and install for free. You can start playing immediately and have nonstop entertainment.
✔️ Awesome daily rewards and power boosters are available.
✔️ Mind-blowing challenges to keep up your interest.
✔️ Let Sophia enjoy her dream by playing on.
✔️ In-app purchases to improve your gameplay and get top scores.
✔️ Linked with Google Play Achievements and Leaderboards.
✔️ Compatible with Android and iOS devices.

If you are ready for an interesting swap matching 3 or more items game, download Crazy Story now and enjoy Sophia’s dreamland frenzy for a long time to come!
